company.headline: About the Developer
company.p1: At Zyrbagan Residences LTD, we specialize in creating exceptional residential projects that blend luxury, comfort, and modern design. Based in Cyprus, we strive to provide homes that inspire and enhance the quality of life. Each of our projects reflects a commitment to quality, innovation, and the perfect balance of comfort and elegance, ensuring long-term value for our residents.
company.p2: Over the years, we have established ourselves as a company dedicated to excellence through our premium developments and partnerships with leading design firms. One of our most valued collaborations is with Porto Buro, a renowned architectural and design studio. Known for their aesthetic style and contemporary design, Porto Buro architects seamlessly integrate elegance and functionality.
company.p3: Together with Porto Buro, we have successfully implemented projects such as:
company.li1: an exclusive collection of luxurious homes showcasing meticulous craftsmanship and stylish design
company.li2: where every detail is thoughtfully designed to ensure sophisticated yet comfortable living.
company.p4: With Park Residences, we have created a community that embodies the best of our philosophy. Located in the picturesque village of Pervolia, just 1.3 km from the Mediterranean Sea, this project includes stunning apartments enriched with Porto Buro's signature style, advanced technologies, and premium materials.

company2.headline: Welcome to Park Residences
company2.p1: Our company, Zyrbagan Residences LTD in Cyprus, embodies the dream home project Park Residences, featuring a pool, gym, playground, and park located in the beautiful aristocratic Pervolia, just 1.3 km from the Mediterranean Sea with stunning views, beaches, and pedestrian zones stretching over 4 km.
company2.p2: Pervolia, surrounded by the sea, green fields, and mountains, creates a unique atmosphere that attracts with its beauty, tranquility, and serenity. It is rich in numerous historical and cultural attractions. Sports enthusiasts will appreciate the Herodotou Tennis Academy just 4 minutes from Park Residences, equipped with courts for tennis and padel. A 10-minute drive takes you to the Larnaca Olympic Shooting Range, a zoo, salt lakes with flamingos, and numerous hiking trails. Private schools Pascal and American Academy are 15 minutes away. The proximity to Larnaca Airport, just 9 km away, makes any trip easy to any part of the world, and the availability of schools, kindergartens, supermarkets, hospitals, and restaurants within walking distance from Park Residences ensures a comfortable life.

gallery.headline: Interior
gallery.description: The interior of Park Residences features a bright color palette, minimalism, and sophisticated details that create an atmosphere of elegance and comfort. Every space is thoughtfully designed, ensuring coziness, functionality, and harmony.

gallery2.headline: Exterior
gallery2.description: The design of Park Residences is created in a modern classic style, providing elegance that will remain timeless for years to come. Each image showcases the essence of our luxurious apartments, modern amenities, and comfortable living.

units.headline: Apartments
units.description: Our building includes 19 comfortable apartments with stunning views. Choose the perfect apartment that suits your preferences and needs.

benefits.headline: Benefits
benefits.description: The advantage of our Park Residences project is its technology and quality. Every detail is thoughtfully designed and implemented by our designers, engineers, and Porto Buro designers. The use of high-quality construction and finishing materials, recuperation, underfloor heating, fireplaces, solar panels, and many other technological features make our project exclusive, economical, and comfortable for living all year round.
benefits.qualityDescription: Our buildings are known for their exceptional quality. We focus on durability and design, ensuring perfection in every detail.
benefits.solarDescription: Solar panels offer not only environmental benefits but also significantly ease the use of existing infrastructure such as the pool and gym by substantially reducing electricity costs, enhancing operational efficiency.
benefits.communityDescription: Our neighborhood includes charming paths and a large park, with no further construction to preserve its tranquility.

location.title: Location
location.description: Located in the heart of Pervolia, just steps away from the historic city of Larnaca, Park Residences offers an exclusive enclave of 19 meticulously designed premium apartments. Park Residences is not just a place to live; it's a commitment to a green future and a tribute to the historical richness of Pervolia.

gym.title: Private Gym
gym.description: GreenLife provides its residents with access to a private gym. The private gym is equipped with modern fitness equipment, catering to a wide range of preferences and fitness levels. From cardio machines to free weights, resistance training equipment, and dedicated areas for yoga and stretching.

solarPanels.title: Solar Panels
solarPanels.description: Solar panels offer not only environmental benefits but also significantly ease the use of existing infrastructure such as the pool and gym by substantially reducing electricity costs, enhancing operational efficiency.

pool.title: Indoor Pool
pool.description: Park Residences extends its commitment to the well-being of its residents by offering access to an exclusive indoor pool. This facility is designed to support a healthy, active lifestyle year-round.
